TopicTitle: Suggestions for obtaining the most current version of mods

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Just as the title says, I'm about to either reformat my HD or uninstall everything completely; however, I don't have a sure fire method of obtaining the latest versions of mods in general. There seems to be a lot of dead links and dated files out there, so if someone could shine a light in the right direction for me that would be great.
I think the best method is to search the 'Add-on Releases' for the mods you use.
Use CKAN to download mods would ensure the latest versions, but CKAN has its own problems.
